abstracts.cdata!:
The project has four major components:
            (a) credit for field rehabilitation and replanting and
            factory rehabilitation and construction; (b) extension and
            training services for smallholders and private estates; (c)
            establishment of nurseries to provide proven V/P planting
            material; (d) technical assistance, staff training,
            marketing and crop diversification studies and management
            study of Bank Rakyat Indonesia.
